name: cleaningOption_turnOn
description: This function is used to activate a specific cleaning mode on the robot vacuum cleaner.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to turn on the cleaning option.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The cleaning mode to turn on.

parameters.name: rvcLocation
parameters.description: The location to turn on the cleaning option.
